meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sam Hopkins Meena Puffer Mike Lewis Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6618.

td.p: Sam Hopkins, an M.B.A. student originally from Prairie Village, Kansas
Meena Puffer, a recruiter from Bear, Delaware
Mike Lewis, a systems engineer from Bloomington, Minnesota (whose 4-day cash winnings total $102,800)

tr.td: THE '60s (19th CENTURY EDITION)
HONEY
"ATH" & YOU SHALL RECEIVE
(Alex: Each correct response will end with those three letters.)
GYMNASTICS
POETRY
WHERE IS IT?
